thread.title: Candlewood Suites Fort Worth West Earns 2015 Torchbearer Aw
thread.title_full: Candlewood Suites Fort Worth West Earns 2015 Torchbearer Aw

author: Worth Hotels, LLC
title: Candlewood Suites Fort Worth West Earns 2015 Torchbearer Aw
text:
FORT WORTH, Texas Candlewood Suites Fort Worth West, operated by Worth Hotels, LLC, was named a 2015 Torchbearer Award Winner by InterContinental Hotels Group (IHG). The Torchbearer Award is given to the top 10 hotels in each of IHG's hotel brands according to guest surveys. This is the third consecutive quality award for Candlewood Suites Fort Worth West. The Candlewood Suites extended stay hotel brand recently won its 2 nd consecutive JD Power & Associates Award for Extended Stay Hotels. Doug Denman , owner of Worth Hotels, LLC who oversees the operations of the hotel, said "Candlewood Suites Fort Worth West is a brand leader for the Candlewood Suites brand. Day-in and day-out we offer guests a superior extended stay experience. Our goal is to offer a ridiculously clean hotel and team members that are passionate about hospitality. I am proud of our team and I am proud of Candlewood Suites' 2 nd consecutive JD Power Award. It is through the efforts of properties like Candlewood Suites Fort Worth West that earned the JD Power Award for the Candlewood Suites brand and IHG."
Candlewood Suites Fort Worth West is located at 402 N. Jim Wright Freeway, White Settlement, TX 76108 (West Loop 820 and Clifford Street ) on the west side of the Dallas/Fort Worth Metroplex. Corporate demand generators include Lockheed Martin Aeronautics, Naval Air Station Fort Worth Joint Reserve Base (NAS Fort Worth JRB), Tarrant County College, Weir Oil & Gas, BAE Systems, Northrop Grumman, Caterpillar, Hawaiian Falls Water Park, Holt Cat, Ritchie Brothers Auctions and Texas Christian University (Go Frogs!).
Candlewood Suites Fort Worth West is an all-suites hotel catering to guests who need quality lodging for a day, a week, a month or beyond.
For reservations call 817-246-6800 or online at www.candlewoodsuitesfortworth.com .
Worth Hotels, LLC is a hotel development and management company with the mission to provide ridiculously clean hotel facilities and team members that are passionate about hospitality.
For more information or to contact Worth Hotels, LLC visit www. WorthHotels.com .
